title: Loose Change
brief_description: ‘Loose Change’ is a short animated film about money and demonstrates what you can do with money. The film has various coins and dollars talking and discussing what it is like being money.
description: ‘Loose Change’ is a short animated film about money and demonstrates what you can do with money. The film has various coins and dollars talking and discussing what it is like being money.
